bug.author: happengor
bug.summary: Error: computer automatically shutdown by running CarlaUE4.sh on Ubuntu 20.04
bug.description: Hey guys, i followed the build instruction by <denchmark-link:https://carla.readthedocs.io/en/latest/start_quickstart>https://carla.readthedocs.io/en/latest/start_quickstart</denchmark-link> on Ubuntu 20.04. After Installation i went into folder /opt/carla-simulator/bin and tried to run CarlaUE4.sh. It requires also entering password of sudo. As the scene showed up, the computer was turned off automatically. Could anybody explain this issue? Is the carlar 0.99 with deb Installation not compatible with ubuntu 20.04?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/joel-mb>@joel-mb</denchmark-link> could you try to launch the deb in a 20.04 distribution?
Thanks, guys, i have solved my problem with a bigger psu. Now i can launch the deb in 20.04.
